Html:
hello!
I am using WSUS to publish an update in my clients. I am working now with Firefox v 24. In the machines with Windows XP and Windows 7 the update is working correctly. The problem is with the machines with W8.

Hi Albricia, what is the version of the Wsus Server 3.2 (server 2003R2 or 2008(R2)) or 6.2 (Server 2012) ?
Closed as per this message : W8 error = 0x80070032 in Update
